response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's important to offer you a fair deal that respects both our business interests and your perceived worth to us. Considering the product's intrinsic value and your personal valuation, we propose to sell it to you for $14,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its actual cost to us and your perceived value, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. We trust this offer will be favorable and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
